cz.syntea.xdef.util

Class XdefToXsd

  • java.lang.Object
    • cz.syntea.xdef.util.XdefToXsd

  • public final class XdefToXsd
extends java.lang.Object
    Convertor of X-definition to XML Schema. (see main(String[]))

    • Method Detail

      • genSchema

        public static void genSchema(java.lang.String xdef,
                             java.lang.String outputDir,
                             java.lang.String schemaPrefix,
                             java.lang.String schemaFileExt,
                             java.io.PrintStream out)
        Generates XML Schema from given X-definition file or as string and saves files to given output directory.
        Parameters:
        xdef - X-definition file or X-definition as string.
        outputDir - output schema files directory.
        schemaPrefix - prefix of XML schema namespace.
        schemaFileExt - file extension of schema files.
        out - where print information messages (if null System.out).

      • genSchema

        public static java.util.Map<?,?> genSchema(java.lang.String xdef,
                                           java.lang.String schemaPrefix,
                                           java.lang.String schemaFileExt,
                                           java.io.PrintStream out)
        Generates XML Schema from given X-definition and returns map of schema file names and DOM Documents.
        Parameters:
        xdef - X-definition file or X-definition as string.
        schemaPrefix - prefix of XML schema namespace.
        schemaFileExt - file extension of schema files.
        out - where print information messages (if null System.out).
        Returns:
        map of schema file names and DOM Documents.

        public static void genSchema(java.io.File xdef,
                             java.lang.String outputDir,

      • genSchema

        public static void genSchema(java.io.File[] xdefs,
                             java.lang.String outputDir,
                             java.lang.String xdName,
                             java.lang.String model,
                             java.lang.String schemaPrefix,
                             java.lang.String schemaFileExt,
                             java.io.PrintStream out)
                      throws java.lang.Exception
        Generates XML Schema from given X-definition files and saves schema files to given output directory.
        Parameters:
        xdefs - X-definition file.
        outputDir - output schema files directory.
        xdName - name of X-definition. May be null, then the nameless X-definition or the first one X-definition is used.
        model - name of model of X-definition to used. May be null, then the value from "xs:root" parameter is used to create models.
        schemaPrefix - prefix of XML schema namespace.
        schemaFileExt - file extension of schema files.
        out - where print information messages (if null System.out).
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - if an error occurs.

      • genSchema

        public static void genSchema(java.lang.String[] xdefs,
                             java.lang.String outputDir,
                             java.lang.String xdName,
                             java.lang.String model,
                             java.lang.String schemaPrefix,
                             java.lang.String schemaFileExt,
                             java.io.PrintStream out)
                      throws java.lang.Exception
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • main

        public static void main(java.lang.String... args)
        Run class from command line.
        Parameters:
        args - array of string with command line arguments:
        • -i list of input sources with X-definitions.
        • -o output directory.
        • -m name of root model (optional).
        • -x name of X-definition (optional).
        • -?, -h, help
